---
author: Jen Carlson
date: Jan 12, 2016 12:03 am
title: Photos: A Huge Crowd Has Gathered Outside David Bowie's NYC Apartment
---

	
										<p>Following the announcement of <a href="https://web.archive.org/web/20160630050542/http://gothamist.com/2016/01/11/remembering_david_bowie.php">David Bowie&apos;s death</a> early Monday morning, a small memorial began to grow outside of his home on Lafayette Street. What <a href="https://web.archive.org/web/20160630050542/http://gothamist.com/2016/01/11/david_bowie_memorial_nyc.php">started with</a> a few bouquets of bodega flowers grew tremendously throughout the day, and by nightfall crowds were lined up and down the street waiting to leave everything from notes, albums, candles and more flowers to less traditional items like shoes. One man even tagged a nearby spot with the words &quot;Let&apos;s Dance,&quot; while others played Bowie songs and lined up to... Instagram.</p>

<p>NYPD officers are also on hand, telling people if they&apos;d like to pay their respects, they need to get on line.</p>

<p>Here was the scene earlier today:</p>

<blockquote class="instagram-media" data-instgrm-captioned="" data-instgrm-version="6" style=" background:#FFF; border:0; border-radius:3px; box-shadow:0 0 1px 0 rgba(0,0,0,0.5),0 1px 10px 0 rgba(0,0,0,0.15); margin: 1px; max-width:658px; padding:0; width:99.375%; width:-webkit-calc(100% - 2px); width:calc(100% - 2px);"><div style="padding:8px;"> <div style=" background:#F8F8F8; line-height:0; margin-top:40px; padding:50.0% 0; text-align:center; width:100%;"> <div style=" background:url(data:image/png;base64,); display:block; height:44px; margin:0 auto -44px; position:relative; top:-22px; width:44px;"></div></div> <p style=" margin:8px 0 0 0; padding:0 4px;"> <a href="https://web.archive.org/web/20160630050542/https://www.instagram.com/p/BAahRtISb-P/" style=" color:#000; font-family:Arial,sans-serif; font-size:14px; font-style:normal; font-weight:normal; line-height:17px; text-decoration:none; word-wrap:break-word;" target="_blank">New Yorkers paying tribute to David Bowie today at the doorstep of his home. #davidbowie #newyork #tribute #rip #ziggystardust</a></p> <p style=" color:#c9c8cd; font-family:Arial,sans-serif; font-size:14px; line-height:17px; margin-bottom:0; margin-top:8px; overflow:hidden; padding:8px 0 7px; text-align:center; text-overflow:ellipsis; white-space:nowrap;">A photo posted by Neil Harbisson (@neilharbisson) on <time style=" font-family:Arial,sans-serif; font-size:14px; line-height:17px;" datetime="2016-01-11T21:47:16+00:00">Jan 11, 2016 at 1:47pm PST</time></p></div></blockquote>
<script async defer src="//web.archive.org/web/20160630050542js_/http://platform.instagram.com/en_US/embeds.js"></script>
<p></p><p>
And by nightfall: 

</p><blockquote class="instagram-media" data-instgrm-captioned="" data-instgrm-version="6" style=" background:#FFF; border:0; border-radius:3px; box-shadow:0 0 1px 0 rgba(0,0,0,0.5),0 1px 10px 0 rgba(0,0,0,0.15); margin: 1px; max-width:658px; padding:0; width:99.375%; width:-webkit-calc(100% - 2px); width:calc(100% - 2px);"><div style="padding:8px;"> <div style=" background:#F8F8F8; line-height:0; margin-top:40px; padding:62.5% 0; text-align:center; width:100%;"> <div style=" background:url(data:image/png;base64,); display:block; height:44px; margin:0 auto -44px; position:relative; top:-22px; width:44px;"></div></div> <p style=" margin:8px 0 0 0; padding:0 4px;"> <a href="https://web.archive.org/web/20160630050542/https://www.instagram.com/p/BAa-dMYiukc/" style=" color:#000; font-family:Arial,sans-serif; font-size:14px; font-style:normal; font-weight:normal; line-height:17px; text-decoration:none; word-wrap:break-word;" target="_blank">Traveled to David Bowie&apos;s memorial in front of his apartment in Soho to bring a bouquet of flowers and give our condolences. It was such a beautiful thing to see everyone gathered to show their love. We miss you Bowie. &#x26A1;&#xFE0F;&#x1F4A5;&#x1F680;</a></p> <p style=" color:#c9c8cd; font-family:Arial,sans-serif; font-size:14px; line-height:17px; margin-bottom:0; margin-top:8px; overflow:hidden; padding:8px 0 7px; text-align:center; text-overflow:ellipsis; white-space:nowrap;">A photo posted by Pamela (@pamelamini) on <time style=" font-family:Arial,sans-serif; font-size:14px; line-height:17px;" datetime="2016-01-12T02:02:15+00:00">Jan 11, 2016 at 6:02pm PST</time></p></div></blockquote>

Thank you to whoever was playing his music. #ripdavidbowie</a></p> <p style=" color:#c9c8cd; font-family:Arial,sans-serif; font-size:14px; line-height:17px; margin-bottom:0; margin-top:8px; overflow:hidden; padding:8px 0 7px; text-align:center; text-overflow:ellipsis; white-space:nowrap;">A video posted by Anthony Bialy (@anthonybialy) on <time style=" font-family:Arial,sans-serif; font-size:14px; line-height:17px;" datetime="2016-01-12T01:44:15+00:00">Jan 11, 2016 at 5:44pm PST</time></p></div></blockquote>
